caption.title: Abundance of viral haplotypes in two E1 gene amplicons.
caption.p: Heat maps indicating the relative abundance (red colour intensity) of distinct amino acid viral haplotypes following deep sequencing of two amplicons COF 1 (A) and CIF 2 (B) that span the near full-length CHIKV E1 gene in 25 Mexican patients. Dendrograms represent clustering of patients according to haplotype diversity.
